mapper.insert: insert into detect_request(project_name, leader_name, leader_phone, project_detail, longitude, latitude, uploader, detect_date, address) values (#{projectName}, #{username}, #{telephone}, #{content}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{uploader}, #{date}, #{address})
mapper.select: select project_name as projectName, project_detail as content, id, detect_date as date, uploader, longitude, latitude, data_status as dataStatus from detect_request where leader_phone = #{phone}
select project_name as projectName, project_detail as content, id, detect_date as date, data_status as dataStatus from detect_request
select uploader from detect_request where id = #{id}
